description: COCOCHOCO free sulphate shamppo is a Pure Essentials Sulphate Free Shampoo is a formulation for individuals having sensitive scalp or dry, damaged, or treated hair that gently cleanses hair without stripping or causing irritation. Pure Essentials Sulphate Free Shampoo is uniquely formulated without sulfate cleansers, DEA, drying soaps, or scalp irritants. For people with sensitive scalp or dry and damaged hair. Naturally derived cleansers, Yucca (cactus)Juice and Soap Bark Extract gently clean hair without drying or causing scalp irritation. Safe for all hair types and for color treated hair .pH 5.0. Extra-gentle soy protein formulation for all hair types. DEA free-soap free.
